item.title: MAP Suite Early Learning Overview
item.dc:creator: Tiffani LeClair
item.description:
Learn how the MAP Suite early learning solution from NWEA can support your district’s commitment to helping students in grades K–3 learn to read and develop early math skills.

item.title: MAP Growth K-2 Fact Sheet
item.dc:creator: Tiffani LeClair
item.description:
This fact sheet shows how to support your youngest learners and maximize their potential. Learn how MAP® Growth™ K-2 accurately measures growth and performance through three assessments that focus on

The post MAP Growth K-2 Fact Sheet appeared first on NWEA.
item.content:encoded:
This fact sheet shows how to support your youngest learners and maximize their potential. Learn how MAP® Growth K-2 accurately measures growth and performance through three assessments that focus on the unique learning needs of your students: growth, screening, and skills checklist.

The post MAP Growth K-2 Fact Sheet appeared first on NWEA.

item.title: MPG K-2 Skills Checklist Selection Guide

item.description:
MAP Growth K-2 How to Choose Screening Tests and Skills Checklist helps educators understand the three types of assessments (Growth, Screening Tests and Skills Checklists), provides a breakdown of what

The post MPG K-2 Skills Checklist Selection Guide appeared first on NWEA.
item.content:encoded:
MAP Growth K-2 How to Choose Screening Tests and Skills Checklist helps educators understand the three types of assessments (Growth, Screening Tests and Skills Checklists), provides a breakdown of what is assessed, and identifies how to determine which test to give and when.

The post MPG K-2 Skills Checklist Selection Guide appeared first on NWEA.

item.title: A High-Performing District Uses Data to Aim Even Higher
item.dc:creator: Tiffani LeClair
item.description:
In 2011, Panhandle Independent School District in Texas began using MAP® Growth™ and MAP Growth K-2 interim assessments. With over 80% of their students meeting proficiency, educational leaders wanted to

The post A High-Performing District Uses Data to Aim Even Higher appeared first on NWEA.
item.content:encoded:
In 2011, Panhandle Independent School District in Texas began using MAP® Growth and MAP Growth K-2 interim assessments. With over 80% of their students meeting proficiency, educational leaders wanted to use MAP Growth data to illuminate the learning needs of their high-performing students so teachers could focus on enrichment activities. But soon they began to explore the multiple benefits MAP Growth provides. Within two years they had expanded their MAP Growth use to cover four measurement needs.

The post A High-Performing District Uses Data to Aim Even Higher appeared first on NWEA.
